name: Runnin' Late!
description:
What happens when you wake up late for a date?

Have you ever forgotten to get dressed?!

#DontBeLate to your date! Collect all your clothes and meet with your girlfriend before the time runs out!

Play a new level every day!

People's Choice award winning game at Startup Weekend Smart Games Mexico City.

Features

Never play the same level!

  • Web
    • Daily level: Play a different level every day.
    • Play online!
  • Mobile
    • Procedural levels with three levels of difficulty.
    • Download and play for free!

Runnin' Late! Early Access Pass

You can support the development of Runnin' Late! and get early access to the Android version right here for only $2. Buy us some coffee and we'll keep the features coming!

The Early Access Pass is only available on itch and will always include the latest development version of Runnin' Late! for Android!

How To Play

Runnin' Late! is a single-tap game.

On web: 

  • Press the space bar or click the screen to jump. 
  • Press or click again to double-jump.

Web version is mobile-friendly!

On mobile: 

  • Tap the screen to jump.
  • Tap again to double-jump.

Collect all your clothes and arrive with your girlfriend before 9 a.m.

Download for FREE

Get the mobile game for free on the App Store and Google Play. Scan the code below to download Runnin' Late!
